Lines.Speech: [i]You exit the entrance of the caves back into the old sewer system below the Alive Dead City. __Hurrying along you spot the ladder that brought you down. __You mutter to yourself to never visit this place again.
[i]Coming up into Alive Dead City, you're greeted with sounds of entertainment, calls for checking fresh store wares, and a dazzle of lights in the cityscape.
[i]Ironically, this is all scheduled programming for the city system. __No one has actually lived here in decades, since the calamity poison engulfed the surface of this planet.
[i]You seem to frequent this place so much that it wouldn't be a far cry to call yourself a resident of Alive Dead City.

[i]But there is too much work for salvage down here, I'd be a fool not to be Command's dog running around here collecting for them.

__Woe is me.
